labels.QUESTION ID: Q1: How would you globally classify the collaborative efficiency:
labels.LABEL: EFFICIENCY WITHIN TEAM

labels.QUESTION ID: Q1: Inter-teams (teams you articulate most with)
labels.LABEL: INTER-TEAM EFFICIENCY

labels.QUESTION ID: Q1: In your organisation as a whole
labels.LABEL: EFFICIENCY WITHIN ORGANISATION

labels.QUESTION ID: Q4: ... I always know exactly what to do about each matter.
labels.LABEL: RESPONSIBILITY

labels.QUESTION ID: Q5: ... in lengthier projects (> 3 months), it is very clear where we want to get and what it means to say "Done!".
labels.LABEL: FINISH LINE

labels.QUESTION ID: Q6: ... I always know the purpose of what I'm doing and that helps me to keep motivated.
labels.LABEL: PURPOSE

labels.QUESTION ID: Q7: ... there is good agility: decisions tend to be made quickly and issues are resolved swiftly.
labels.LABEL: AGILITY

labels.QUESTION ID: Q10: ... there is little doubt about who is responsible for what. Potential grey areas that come up when splitting responsibilities are quickly discussed and clarified.
labels.LABEL: OWNERSHIP

labels.QUESTION ID: Q11: ... people are open to renegotiate deadlines. Each time something will likely get delayed, I am always told ahead of time.
labels.LABEL: COMMITMENT ADJUSTMENT

labels.QUESTION ID: Q12: ... I rarely get "blocked". I know exactly who to speak to in order to get matters back on track.
labels.LABEL: ROAD BLOCKS

labels.QUESTION ID: Q13: ... internal processes are simple and efficient.
labels.LABEL: PROCESSES

labels.QUESTION ID: Q15: ... the use of emails is efficient.
labels.LABEL: EMAILS

labels.QUESTION ID: Q16: ... meetings are effective.
labels.LABEL: MEETINGS

labels.QUESTION ID: Q17: ... is it easy and agile to report / know the status of each matter.
labels.LABEL: REPORTING

labels.QUESTION ID: Q6: "Tenho sido capaz de motivar a minha equipa. Trabalham com sentido de miss?o, d?o o seu melhor e acreditam na import?ncia do que fazem."

labels.LABEL: ORIENTA??O

labels.LABEL: AUTONOMIA

labels.QUESTION ID: Q11: "Tenho conseguido criar um bom esp?rito de equipa, com um ADN forte em alinhamento e valores."

labels.QUESTION ID: Q12: "Tenho conseguido servir a equipa e ser um elemento catalizador do seu bom desempenho."

labels.QUESTION ID: Q4: "In my work environment I am able to produce in a focused manner and with no major distractions."
labels.LABEL: FOCUS

labels.QUESTION ID: Q5: "In my case, it's rare having to manage lots of different issues simultaneously. The number of different subjects that I have to manage simultaneously is suitable, not excessive."
labels.LABEL: DIVERSITY

labels.QUESTION ID: Q6: "I organize my work methodically and efficiently, and I feel everything is under control."
labels.LABEL: CONTROL

labels.QUESTION ID: Q7: "I rarely procrastinate. I always respect the priorities that I've defined on my to-do list."
labels.LABEL: PRIORITIES

labels.QUESTION ID: Q10: "My duties are defined very clearly. I know exactly what my responsibilities are."
labels.LABEL: RESPONSABILITIES

labels.QUESTION ID: Q11: "The current corporate strategy and how it should be implemented in my team/unit/department are very clear to me."
labels.LABEL: STRATEGY

labels.QUESTION ID: Q12: "I am perfectly aware of my current goals, and have no doubt about which priorities to respect."
labels.LABEL: GOALS

labels.QUESTION ID: Q13: "Regarding success criteria defining my performance, my vision and that of my appraiser/leader match entirely."
labels.LABEL: SUCCESS CRITERIA

labels.QUESTION ID: Q15: ...email use is efficient."
labels.LABEL: EMAILS

labels.QUESTION ID: Q16: ...meetings are effective."
labels.LABEL: MEETINGS

labels.QUESTION ID: Q17: ...there is good agility: decisions tend to be fast and issues are resolved quickly."
labels.LABEL: AGILITY

labels.QUESTION ID: Q18: ...internal processes are simple and efficient."
labels.LABEL: PROCESSES

labels.QUESTION ID: Q19: ...there is a high trust environment among co-workers."
labels.LABEL: TRUST

labels.QUESTION ID: Q20: ...there is little or no doubt about every task ownership. When grey areas emerge about division of responsibilities, it is quite simple to discuss and clarify them.
labels.LABEL: GREY AREAS
